feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.70.0
entry.content:
This releases brings BIG changes to the upload process. Firstly, file upload progress is shown as it happens, so you can see what's going on; then, the extraction of zip files happens in the background, so you can carry on using Manyfold while it happens. Models are created straight away, without the need for a full scan, so the "scan after upload" button has gone away. And finally, perhaps our single most popular feature request - you can now upload individual files as new models! So, no need to zip up a single STL any more.

We're certainly going to build on this more, with options like uploading files into an existing model, and renaming models during the upload process, which you can see on the feature roadmap.

We've also made changes to the way the background processing works. Expensive jobs like geometric analysis and file conversion may now take a little longer to work through by default, but they shouldn't saturate the server and stop other things happening in the meantime. You can control the concurrency of the background runners using the new DEFAULT_WORKER_CONCURRENCY and PERFORMANCE_WORKER_CONCURRENCY options, which are set to 4 and 1 by default. If you have lots of CPU and memory on your server, you can bump those up.

The underlying change that's enabled all of this is a big rewrite of the actual file storage engine. You shouldn't notice any difference, although this enables some great stuff in future, like support for cloud storage.

NOTE: it may take a long time to migrate data during the upgrade, depending on the size of your library, perhaps in the region of 10-20 seconds per gigabyte.

If you have any problems, as always, come say hi in our very helpful support chat or file a bug report on GitHub.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Upload single 3d or image files as new models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2323
  • Improved uploader using Shrine and Uppy by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2315
  • Automatically scan uploaded files, and more efficiently by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2320
  • Change default upload size limit to 1GiB by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2319
  • Add environment variable for database pool size by @aneurinprice in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2293

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Use new Rails 7.1 Redis connection pool by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2298
  • Fix potential file access error when using read-only container filesystem by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2313
  • Renormalize i18n file by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2321
  • Fix CSS import for Uppy by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2326
  • Fix tag 404 error when deleting models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2327

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Use our own fork of sqlite3_ar_regexp to get Rails 7.1 support by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2294
  • Update to Ruby 3.3.1 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2296
  • Update donate link to go to website donate page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2300
  • Create security reporting policy by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2304
  • Add Shrine storage engine by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2198
  • Set connection pool size for ActiveJob::Status to same as DB by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2310
  • Improve behaviour of background workers by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2312
  • Move uploading into ModelsController by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2314
  • Move archive decompression into a background job by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2322

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.69.0...v0.70.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.70.1
entry.content:
Just a quick bugfix to speed up data migration during upgrade to v0.70.0. See release notes for that version for everything else!

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Speed up file data migration by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2329

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.70.0...v0.70.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.70.2
entry.content:
FIxing a couple of bugs in the recent release, mainly around ever-increasing cache folder size (which should now be automatically cleaned up) and some subtle background errors at first startup and library creation.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Automatically update workers with new libraries before jobs start by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2341
  • Avoid copying and caches when organizing files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2342

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Clean up cache files on app startup by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2334

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.70.1...v0.70.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.70.3
entry.content:
Another bug fix release, mainly for people with libraries with IDs of 10 or over, plus a bonus fix for extraneous MeshLoadErrors (because it was trying to load images not meshes)

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Check if a file is 3d before trying to do geometric analysis by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2343
  • Fix incorrect library fetching when ID has >1 digit by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2344

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.70.2...v0.70.3

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.71.0
entry.content:
Not got enough disk space? Now you can create a library that uses S3-compatible cloud storage instead of local disk! This could be from any of a large number of open source or commercial services - either out on the public Internet, or self-hosted!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • S3 storage support for libraries by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2356

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • FIx deletion bug caused by presupported model links by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2355
  • Fix storage registration during migrations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2357

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Add ability to set storage engine for library by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2345
  • Refactor file access so that everything goes through Shrine by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2351
  • Improve library creation and edit forms by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2359
  • Hide unused storage service options on page load by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2361

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.70.3...v0.71.0
